MAP.COMMENT: ************ Set Action, and set TestIndicator to LIVE

MAP.NAME: $null
MAP.COMMENT: If fileName is null, this implies that savePipeline above is disabled

Values.value: The request information (pipeline) was not saved to file.

MAP.NAME: $default
MAP.COMMENT: If fileName is NOT null, this implies that savePipeline above is enabled, return the fileName

Values.value: The request information (pipeline) was saved to file: %fileName%

SEQUENCE.NAME: $null
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: If TestIndicator is Null (this implies that the BCM database is down, and to return hardcoded results

Values.value: This is a hardcoded reply -- this is not real data. %fileName%

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Main - Process LXKEnterprise.BCM:routingInfo_REQ, and return LXKEnterprise.BCM:routingInfo_RPL

Values.value: About to validate the company number passed in
Company Number missing - CO_NBR is a required field for the BCM lookup. %fileName%

EXIT.COMMENT: Stop building the reply, go return it

Values.value: About to format the Request data

INVOKE.COMMENT: PadLeft company number with 0's to make it 5chars long
Format the indicator (If the caller didnt pass in Indicator, set it to NA)

RETRY.COMMENT: About to select the routing information

INVOKE.COMMENT: Query Routing info based on Company Number & Indicator

Values.value: About to map results of BCM query to the reply document

INVOKE.COMMENT: See how many results were found

Values.value: No matching data was found in the Routing table for given Company Number. %fileName%

EXIT.COMMENT: Stop building the reply, go return it

BRANCH.COMMENT: Stop processing after the first result

MAP.COMMENT: Map the results into the Reply Document
Set BCM Reply Status to Success
Embeed Pipeline FileName into the error Message

INVOKE.COMMENT: Build Error Message and Send it for Reporting
